Package com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Service.generic

Class SlugableService<Type extends Slugable,Repository extends SlugableReposetory<Type>,Dto>

java.lang.Object
com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Service.generic.BaseService<Type,Repository,Dto>
com.example.paragonPioneerBackend.Service.generic.SlugableService<Type,Repository,Dto>
Type Parameters:
Type - The entity type this service is responsible for. Must extend BaseEntity and implement Slugable.
Repository - The JPA repository type used by this service. Must extend SlugableReposetory.
Dto - The data transfer object (DTO) type used for transferring data between processes.
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildingService, GoodService, PopulationService, RecipeService
public abstract class SlugableService<Type extends Slugable,Repository extends SlugableReposetory<Type>,Dto> extends BaseService<Type,Repository,Dto>
Abstract base service class providing CRUD functionalities for entities with slugs. This class encapsulates common service layer operations for entities with slugs, offering a foundation for entity-specific services. It leverages Spring Data JPA repositories for database interactions.

    • findAllContainingName

      Retrieves all entities that contain the provided string in their name.
      Parameters:

      name - The string to be searched for in the names of the entities.
      Returns:

    • findSmthByIdSlugName

      public Type findSmthByIdSlugName(String smth)
      This method is used to find an entity by its ID, slug, or name. It first tries to parse the provided string as a UUID and find the entity by its ID. If the entity is not found by its ID, it tries to find the entity by its slug. If the entity is still not found, it tries to find the entity by its name. If the entity is not found by its ID, slug, or name, it throws an EntityNotFoundException.
      Parameters:
      smth - The string that represents the ID, slug, or name of the entity.
      Returns:
      The entity if found by its ID, slug, or name. When Multiple entities are found by name, the first one is returned.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the entity is not found by its ID, slug, or name.

    • getByIdIriOrSlug

      public Type getByIdIriOrSlug(String idOrIri) throws ParagonPioneerBeException
      This method is used to retrieve an entity by its ID, IRI, or slug. It first tries to retrieve the entity by its ID or IRI using the inherited getByIdOrIri method. If this fails (i.e., if an exception is thrown), it assumes the provided string is a slug. It then tries to retrieve the entity by its slug. If the entity is not found by its slug, it throws an EntityNotFoundException.
      Parameters:
      idOrIri - The ID, IRI, or slug of the entity to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved entity.
      Throws:
      ParagonPioneerBeException - if the entity with the provided ID, IRI, or slug is not found in the repository.
